tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE material_orders (
    order_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    material_id UUID,
    supplier_id UUID,
    quantity INT,
    order_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE material_transactions (
    transaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    material_id UUID,
    previous_quantity INT,
    new_quantity INT,
    transaction_type STRING,
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP
);
CREATE TABLE building_materials_inventory (material_id INT PRIMARY KEY, material_name VARCHAR, quantity INT, location VARCHAR);
CREATE TABLE material_categories (category_id INT PRIMARY KEY, category_name VARCHAR);
CREATE TABLE material_suppliers (supplier_id INT PRIMARY KEY, supplier_name VARCHAR, contact_number VARCHAR, email VARCHAR);
CREATE TABLE material_transactions (transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY, material_id INT, quantity_change INT, transaction_type VARCHAR, transaction_date TIMESTAMP);
CREATE TABLE material_history (history_id INT PRIMARY KEY, material_id INT, quantity_before INT, quantity_after INT, transaction_id INT, transaction_date TIMESTAMP);
